description: Generate an image based on the given text by employing AI models like Flux,         Stable Diffusion, and other top models.

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.info: The text prompt to generate the image from. Must be between 1-5000 characters.

inputs.name: aspect_ratio
inputs.info: The aspect ratio of the generated image. Must be one of the following:                '1:1', '16:9', '21:9', '3:2', '2:3', '4:5', '5:4', '3:4', '4:3', '9:16', '9:21'                 Default is 1:1.

inputs.name: url
inputs.info: A valid URL where the generated image will be sent.

inputs.name: file_store_key
inputs.info: The key used to store the image on Jigsawstack File Storage. Not required if url is specified.

inputs.name: width
inputs.info: The width of the image. Must be between 256-1920 pixels.

inputs.name: height
inputs.info: The height of the image. Must be between 256-1920 pixels.

inputs.name: steps
inputs.info: The number of denoising steps. Must be between 1-90.                 Higher values produce better quality images but take more time to generate.

inputs.name: output_format
inputs.info: The output format of the generated image. Must be one of the following values:                png or svg

inputs.name: negative_prompt
inputs.info: The text prompt to avoid in the generated image.                 Must be between 1-5000 characters.

inputs.name: seed
inputs.info: Makes generation deterministic.                Using the same seed and set of parameters will produce identical image each time.

inputs.name: guidance
inputs.info: Higher guidance forces the model to better follow the prompt,                 but may result in lower quality output. Must be between 1-28.
